nodes.title: How can corporations be more socially responsible? Today’s social responsibility work must be embedded and connected to the core of what an organization does. @emilykanemiller, founder + CEO @EthosGiving, shares her expert insights: https://t.co/UuoyIqZPVq https://t.co/8iu6EjisEo

localize.full_text: 企業がより社会的責任を果たすには？今日の社会的責任の仕事は、組織が行うことの核心に組み込まれ、接続されていなければなりません。EthosGivingの創設者+CEOである@emilykanemillerが、専門家としての洞察を語ります。https://t.co/UuoyIqZPVq https://t.co/8iu6EjisEo

nodes.title: In a time of war, is there any progress in the global movement toward peace as a norm? Emma Varvaloucas (@heyemmavarv), host of What Could Go Right? podcast explains why we should hold some optimism. https://t.co/MF343g7dsY https://t.co/4jWE1e6Q7c

nodes.title: How has climate change impacted the snowpack and snowfall processes? Andrew Schwartz (@snow_d0c), Atmospheric scientist specializing in snow @UCBerkeley, Lead Scientist at UC Berkeley Central Sierra Snow Laboratory, gives his expert take. https://t.co/4byt1n85pU https://t.co/Wki41xYxXK
nodes.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 気候変動は積雪や降雪のプロセスにどのような影響を及ぼしているのでしょうか？Andrew Schwartz (@snow_d0c), Atmospheric scientist specializing in snow @UCBerkeley, Lead Scientist at UC Berkeley Central Sierra Snow Laboratory, 彼の専門的な見解を述べる。 https://t.co/4byt1n85pU https://t.co/Wki41xYxXK
气候变化对积雪和降雪过程有什么影响？安德鲁-施瓦茨（@snow_d0c），专门研究雪的大气科学家@UCBerkeley，加州大学伯克利分校中央山脉雪实验室的首席科学家，给出了他的专业观点。https://t.co/4byt1n85pU https://t.co/Wki41xYxXK
氣候變化對積雪和降雪過程有什麼影響？安德魯-施瓦茨（@snow_d0c），專門研究雪的大氣科學家@UCBerkeley，加州大學伯克利分校中央山脈雪實驗室的首席科學家，給出了他的專業觀點。https://t.co/4byt1n85pU https://t.co/Wki41xYxXK
